title: Print, "Paper Doll Costume in Cream with Black Stripes and Pink Sash", 1876–80
medium: Lithograph, brush and watercolors on cream heavy wove paper
description: This cream colored gown has black stripes on the bodice and sleeves.  A pink sash drapes from the side, and the full skirt is has further decoration. She wears black netted gloves.  The back and front of this dress are depicted.

tombstone.epitaph:
Print, "Paper Doll Costume in Cream with Black Stripes and Pink Sash", 1876–80.
1876–80. Lithograph, brush and watercolors on cream heavy wove paper. Gift of Grace Lincoln Temple. 1937-22-10.
